short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your ticket to a world where Danny DeVito reigns supreme over images and Rick Astley's legendary tunes accompany every video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a prank extension that replaces all images with Danny DeVito and videos with Never Gonna Give You Up. You can toggle it on and off by clicking on the icon.
